channel.title: Can you make a server based off of Moparclassic?
channel.description: I know most people use EasyRSC, Noobscape, or RSCA sources as their base, but can you use Moparclassic? I have the server folder, but cannot find the full client folder anywhere. Can someone post a link for me (if there is one)? Ty in advance...

item.title: Can you make a server based off of Moparclassic?
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.source: Can you make a server based off of Moparclassic?

item.title: Can you make a server based off of Moparclassic?
item.dc:creator: @vortex vortex
item.description:
@vortex wrote:

[quote=“RLN, post:7, topic:448020”]…[/quote]You need to use the pre-beta branch https://github.com/codeforfame/client/tree/pre-beta

Read full topic
item.source: Can you make a server based off of Moparclassic?

item.title: Can you make a server based off of Moparclassic?
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“RLN, post:5, topic:448020”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=550910.msg4037863#msg4037863 date=1341349085]

[quote author=RLN link=topic=550910.msg4037643#msg4037643 date=1341336843]
Either grab/fix the one codeforfame had up (last time I checked it didn’t even compile), or grab/fix vortex’s base client which I also had a bit of trouble with banking/trading (he may have fixed it since then - not sure), or modify the RSCA client

CodeForFame’s: https://github.com/CodeForFame/Client/
vortex’s: https://github.com/xetr0v/mpc-client/
[/quote]What the hell are you talking about? It’s always compiled just fine…
[/quote]Not true… I recall I double checked with some people on IRC and they were having the same problem. I think that could have been the main reason vortex threw up his own client for it.[/quote]
Ugh. I’ve never had any problems with compiling any of the clients… The only thing I can think off is that people confuse the AudioReader warnings as errors. Or they use JDK7, since the client uses XML aswell.

Read full topic
item.source: Can you make a server based off of Moparclassic?
